comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Juliet Pierpont Morgan (1870-1952) married William Pierson Hamilton (1869-1950). She was the daughter of JP Morgan: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._P._Morgan She had five children; here's her son Pierpont Morgan Hamilton's wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pierpont_M._Hamilton
